TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlLanguageConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: Provides type conversion for the class.

span.span: Provides type conversion for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器的主要存在以便现有`xml:lang`XML 文件中的设置不会干扰的使用的特性的分析作为其基础类型。This converter exists primarily so that the existing `xml:lang` settings in an XML file do not interfere with the parsing of attributes that use as their underlying type.
